message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

In financial statements, the "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS) line item represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the period. This is the direct cost attributable to the production of goods sold by a company.

Looking at the income statement provided:
- I can see a clear line item labeled "Cost of Goods Sold" with an amount of 5,580,000.00 on 2024-01-31.

This is the value we're looking for as it represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5580000.00'} }
```
